methods.name: canPlaceItemThroughFace
javadoc: Returns true if automation can insert the given item in the given slot from the given side.

methods.name: canTakeItemThroughFace
javadoc: Returns true if automation can extract the given item in the given slot from the given side.

methods.name: getMaxStackSize
javadoc: Returns the maximum stack size for a inventory slot. Seems to always be 64, possibly will be extended.

methods.name: setChanged
javadoc: For tile entities, ensures the chunk containing the tile entity is saved to disk later - the game won't think it hasn't changed and skip it.
